import { IonCard, IonCardContent, IonCardHeader, IonCardSubtitle, IonLabel, IonSegment, IonSegmentButton, IonCardTitle, IonContent, IonHeader, IonMenu, IonSplitPane, IonTitle, IonToolbar } from '@ionic/react'; import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useHistory } from "react-router"; const ViewCourse: React.FC = () => { const history = useHistory() const segmentChangeHandler = (event: CustomEvent) => { history.push(event.detail.value) } return ( My course name Menu Menu Content
Main View Main View Content
{/* <> Course Topic Quiz Level Question */} Here's a small text description for the card content. Nothing more, nothing less. ); } export default ViewCourse;
